knimeNode.name: GATKVariantFiltration
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filters variant calls using a number of user-selectable, parameterizable criteria.

fullDescription.intro: VariantFiltration is a GATK tool for hard-filtering variant calls based on certain criteria. Records are hard-filtered by changing the value in the FILTER field to something other than PASS. More info: https://www.broadinstitute.org/gatk/gatkdocs/org_broadinstitute_gatk_tools_walkers_filters_VariantFiltration.php
